uk.ac.glasgow.jagora

Interface Trader


  • public interface Trader
    Defines the behaviour of a trader who places and cancels orders on a stock exchange.
    Author:
    tws

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buyStock(Stock stock, java.lang.Integer quantity, java.lang.Double price)
      Increments the trader's inventory of the specified stock by the specified quantity and debit's their cash balance with the unit price multipled by the quantity.
      java.lang.Double getCash() 
      java.lang.Integer getInventoryHolding(Stock stock) 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.util.Set<Stock> getTradingStocks() 
      void sellStock(Stock stock, java.lang.Integer quantity, java.lang.Double price)
      Decrements the trader's inventory of the specified stock by the specified quantity and credit's their cash balance with the unit price multiplied by the quantity.
      void speak(StockExchange stockExchange)
      Presents the Trader with an opportunity to place or cancel orders on a stock exchange.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

      • getCash

        java.lang.Double getCash()
        Returns:
        this Trader's current cash balance. A trader cannot have less than 0 cash.

      • sellStock

        void sellStock(Stock stock,
               java.lang.Integer quantity,
               java.lang.Double price)
        throws TradeException
        Decrements the trader's inventory of the specified stock by the specified quantity and credit's their cash balance with the unit price multiplied by the quantity.
        Parameters:
        stock -
        quantity - the number of stock units to be sold.
        price - the unit price for the stock sale.
        Throws:
        TradeException - if the Trader does not hold the necessary quantity of the specified stock.

      • buyStock

        void buyStock(Stock stock,
              java.lang.Integer quantity,
              java.lang.Double price)
       throws TradeException
        Increments the trader's inventory of the specified stock by the specified quantity and debit's their cash balance with the unit price multipled by the quantity.
        Parameters:
        stock -
        quantity - the number of stock units to be bought.
        price - the unit price of the stock purchase.
        Throws:
        TradeException - if the Trader does not have sufficient cash to meet the price of the purchase.

      • getInventoryHolding

        java.lang.Integer getInventoryHolding(Stock stock)
        Parameters:
        stock -
        Returns:
        the current quantity of the specified stock in the Trader's inventory. Quantity cannot be less than zero.

      • speak

        void speak(StockExchange stockExchange)
        Presents the Trader with an opportunity to place or cancel orders on a stock exchange. Implementations of stock exchange may limit the window of opportunity for a trader to speak once the speak operation has been invoked.
        Parameters:
        stockExchange -

      • getTradingStocks

        java.util.Set<Stock> getTradingStocks()
        Returns:
        the set of stock types that this Trader has on inventory.
